title: Pause Wine Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Italian, Organic, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Sources produce from local farms, and the chef is a former Millennium Restaurant cook, so over half the menu at any time can be prepared vegan. Offers Rocket Ship vegan ice cream. All organic wine. Happy hour for wine and $5 food specials from 5-7pm. See menu on website.
